steam.name: Steam
steam.desc: The largest PC gaming platform with thousands of games, cloud saves, and community features.

epic.name: Epic Games
epic.desc: Free games weekly. Home to Fortnite and Unreal Engine exclusives.

gog.name: GOG Galaxy
gog.desc: DRM-free games and a unified library connecting all your platforms.

battlenet.name: Battle.net
battlenet.desc: Blizzard launcher for WoW, Diablo, Overwatch, and Call of Duty.

ea.name: EA App
ea.desc: EA launcher for FC, Battlefield, Apex Legends, and The Sims.

ubisoft.name: Ubisoft Connect
ubisoft.desc: Launcher for Assassin's Creed, Far Cry, Rainbow Six, and more.

xbox.name: Xbox
xbox.desc: Microsoft's launcher for Game Pass, Xbox games, and cloud gaming.

riot.name: Riot Client
riot.desc: Launcher for League of Legends, Valorant, and TFT.

rockstar.name: Rockstar
rockstar.desc: Launcher for GTA V, Red Dead Redemption 2, and other Rockstar titles.

itch.name: itch.io
itch.desc: Indie game marketplace with thousands of free and paid games.

amazon.name: Amazon Games
amazon.desc: Amazon's launcher with Prime Gaming free games.

playnite.name: Playnite
playnite.desc: Open source game library manager. Unifies all launchers.

discord.name: Discord
discord.desc: Voice, video, and text chat for gamers. Create or join servers.

teamspeak.name: TeamSpeak
teamspeak.desc: Low-latency voice chat for competitive gaming.

guilded.name: Guilded
guilded.desc: Discord alternative with scheduling, forums, and team tools.

parsec.name: Parsec
parsec.desc: Ultra-low latency game streaming and remote desktop.

moonlight.name: Moonlight
moonlight.desc: Stream games from your PC to any device via NVIDIA GameStream.

obs.name: OBS Studio
obs.desc: Free, open source streaming and recording software.

streamlabs.name: Streamlabs
streamlabs.desc: All-in-one streaming with alerts, widgets, and overlays.

twitchstudio.name: Twitch Studio
twitchstudio.desc: Twitch's official streaming software for beginners.

voicemeeter.name: Voicemeeter
voicemeeter.desc: Virtual audio mixer for streaming and podcasting.

nvidiabroadcast.name: NVIDIA Broadcast
nvidiabroadcast.desc: AI-powered noise removal, virtual backgrounds, and auto-frame.

medal.name: Medal.tv
medal.desc: Clip and share your gaming moments automatically.

elgato.name: Stream Deck
elgato.desc: Control software for Elgato Stream Deck hardware.

prism.name: Prism Live
prism.desc: Free streaming software with virtual camera and effects.

hwinfo.name: HWiNFO
hwinfo.desc: Comprehensive hardware analysis and real-time monitoring.

afterburner.name: Afterburner
afterburner.desc: GPU overclocking, voltage control, and on-screen display.

cpuz.name: CPU-Z
cpuz.desc: Detailed CPU, motherboard, memory, and SPD information.

gpuz.name: GPU-Z
gpuz.desc: GPU specs, clocks, temps, VRAM, and BIOS info.

coretemp.name: Core Temp
coretemp.desc: CPU temperature monitor with logging and alerts.

crystaldiskinfo.name: CrystalDiskInfo
crystaldiskinfo.desc: SSD/HDD health monitoring with SMART data analysis.

crystaldiskmark.name: CrystalDiskMark
crystaldiskmark.desc: Disk benchmark tool for measuring read/write speeds.

fpsmonitor.name: FPS Monitor
fpsmonitor.desc: In-game FPS counter with hardware monitoring overlay.

openhardwaremonitor.name: Open Hardware Monitor
openhardwaremonitor.desc: Free, open source hardware monitoring tool.

nvcleanstall.name: NVCleanstall
nvcleanstall.desc: Clean NVIDIA driver installer without bloatware.

displaydriveruninstaller.name: DDU
displaydriveruninstaller.desc: Completely remove GPU drivers for clean installs.

processlasso.name: Process Lasso
processlasso.desc: CPU optimization and process priority automation for gaming.

brave.name: Brave
brave.desc: Privacy-focused browser with built-in ad blocking.

chrome.name: Chrome
chrome.desc: Fast, widely-used browser with great DevTools.

edge.name: Edge
edge.desc: Microsoft's Chromium browser with vertical tabs.

operagx.name: Opera GX
operagx.desc: Gaming browser with RAM/CPU limiters and Twitch integration.

vlc.name: VLC
vlc.desc: Plays everything. Free, open source media player.

spotify.name: Spotify
spotify.desc: Stream millions of songs and podcasts.

foobar2000.name: foobar2000
foobar2000.desc: Lightweight, customizable audio player for audiophiles.

mpchc.name: MPC-HC
mpchc.desc: Lightweight video player with hardware acceleration.

plex.name: Plex
plex.desc: Media server to stream your library anywhere.

jellyfin.name: Jellyfin
jellyfin.desc: Free, open source alternative to Plex.

audacity.name: Audacity
audacity.desc: Free audio editor for recording and editing.

handbrake.name: HandBrake
handbrake.desc: Video transcoder. Convert to any format.

stremio.name: Stremio
stremio.desc: Modern streaming hub for movies and shows.

musicbee.name: MusicBee
musicbee.desc: Feature-rich music player and library manager.

7zip.name: 7-Zip
7zip.desc: Free file archiver with high compression ratio.

sharex.name: ShareX
sharex.desc: Screenshot and screen recording with auto-upload.

powertoys.name: PowerToys
powertoys.desc: Power-user utilities: FancyZones, PowerRename, Color Picker.

everything.name: Everything
everything.desc: Instant file search. Indexes your drive in seconds.

qbittorrent.name: qBittorrent
qbittorrent.desc: Free, open source torrent client without ads.

bitwarden.name: Bitwarden
bitwarden.desc: Open source password manager with sync.

keepassxc.name: KeePassXC
keepassxc.desc: Offline password manager with strong encryption.

notepadplusplus.name: Notepad++
notepadplusplus.desc: Powerful text editor with syntax highlighting.

wiztree.name: WizTree
wiztree.desc: Fastest disk space analyzer. Find large files instantly.

windirstat.name: WinDirStat
windirstat.desc: Visual disk usage statistics and cleanup.

autohotkey.name: AutoHotkey
autohotkey.desc: Automation scripting for hotkeys and macros.

f.lux.name: f.lux
f.lux.desc: Reduce blue light at night for better sleep.

winrar.name: WinRAR
winrar.desc: Popular archive tool with RAR support.

revo.name: Revo Uninstaller
revo.desc: Thorough uninstaller that removes leftover files.

bulk.name: Bulk Rename
bulk.desc: Rename thousands of files with powerful patterns.

imageglass.name: ImageGlass
imageglass.desc: Fast, modern image viewer with wide format support.

ditto.name: Ditto
ditto.desc: Clipboard manager with history and search.

eartrumpet.name: EarTrumpet
eartrumpet.desc: Per-app volume control from the system tray.

logitechghub.name: Logitech G HUB
logitechghub.desc: Configure Logitech mice, keyboards, and headsets.

razersynapse.name: Razer Synapse
razersynapse.desc: RGB and macro control for Razer peripherals.

icue.name: Corsair iCUE
icue.desc: Control Corsair RGB, fans, and peripherals.

steelseriesgg.name: SteelSeries GG
steelseriesgg.desc: Engine for SteelSeries keyboards, mice, and headsets.

nzxtcam.name: NZXT CAM
nzxtcam.desc: Monitor temps and control NZXT cooling and RGB.

signalrgb.name: SignalRGB
signalrgb.desc: Universal RGB control for any brand.

openrgb.name: OpenRGB
openrgb.desc: Open source RGB control for all devices.

python.name: Python
python.desc: Popular language for scripts, AI, and automation.

nodejs.name: Node.js
nodejs.desc: JavaScript runtime for servers and tools.

wt.name: Terminal
wt.desc: Modern terminal with tabs and GPU rendering.

wsl.name: Ubuntu (WSL)
wsl.desc: Linux environment on Windows via WSL.

jetbrains.name: JetBrains Toolbox
jetbrains.desc: Manage all JetBrains IDEs in one place.

vcredist.name: VC++ Runtime
vcredist.desc: Visual C++ runtime required by many games.

directx.name: DirectX
directx.desc: Graphics API runtime for Windows games.

java.name: Java
java.desc: Java runtime for Minecraft and enterprise apps.

cinebench.name: Cinebench
cinebench.desc: CPU benchmark based on Cinema 4D rendering.

furmark.name: FurMark
furmark.desc: GPU stress test and OpenGL benchmark.

heroic.name: Heroic
heroic.desc: Open-source launcher that can unify Epic, GOG, and Amazon games.

sunshine.name: Sunshine
sunshine.desc: Self-hosted low-latency streaming host (perfect pair for Moonlight).

steamlink.name: Steam Link
steamlink.desc: Stream Steam games to other devices/PCs over LAN or internet.

rtss.name: RivaTuner Statistics Server (RTSS)
rtss.desc: The classic frametime/FPS OSD overlay; pairs well with Afterburner.

capframex.name: CapFrameX
capframex.desc: Capture and analyze frametimes for proper performance comparisons.

latencymon.name: LatencyMon
latencymon.desc: Diagnose DPC/ISR latency issues that cause audio crackle and stutter.

fancontrol.name: FanControl
fancontrol.desc: Make smart fan curves tied to CPU/GPU temps (quiet + cool).

librehardwaremonitor.name: Libre Hardware Monitor
librehardwaremonitor.desc: Open-source hardware monitoring (temps, fans, voltages, clocks).

bcuninstaller.name: Bulk Crap Uninstaller
bcuninstaller.desc: Batch uninstall apps and clean leftovers—great after a fresh install.

sysinternals_suite.name: Sysinternals Suite
sysinternals_suite.desc: Power Windows troubleshooting tools bundle (ProcMon, Autoruns, etc.).

powershell.name: PowerShell
powershell.desc: Modern PowerShell (pwsh). Nice for scripting and automation.

gh.name: GitHub CLI
gh.desc: Use GitHub from the terminal (issues, PRs, releases, auth).

vivaldi.name: Vivaldi
vivaldi.desc: Highly customizable Chromium browser for power users.

librewolf.name: LibreWolf
librewolf.desc: Privacy-focused Firefox fork with reduced telemetry and tracking.

rainmeter.name: Rainmeter
rainmeter.desc: Desktop skins/widgets—perfect for that retro-custom PC vibe.

vcredist_x86.name: VC++ Runtime (x86)
vcredist_x86.desc: 32-bit Visual C++ runtime used by many older games and tools.

dotnet_runtime_8.name: .NET Runtime 8

dotnet_sdk_8.name: .NET SDK 8
dotnet_sdk_8.desc: Full .NET SDK for building and running .NET projects locally.

occt.name: OCCT
occt.desc: All-in-one stress testing for CPU/GPU/RAM/PSU stability.

unigine_heaven.name: Unigine Heaven
unigine_heaven.desc: Classic GPU benchmark and stability test.

unigine_valley.name: Unigine Valley
unigine_valley.desc: GPU benchmark for stress testing and performance comparisons.

unigine_superposition.name: Unigine Superposition
unigine_superposition.desc: GPU benchmark; occasionally the winget download can be flaky.

torbrowser.name: Tor Browser
torbrowser.desc: Privacy browser via Tor network (winget install can be inconsistent).
